cause.description:
pink green purple blonde brown red????....... hmmmmm its tough when u just think uv found the right one and then WHAM!!! u see a better one ... n those darn roots just keep on growing n showing GRRRRRRRR
hair dye on prescription FREE FOR ALL
a worthy cause im sure u will all agree :)
1. hair can be ANY colour we choose
cause.mission: allow free hair dye to ladys who just 'cant decide'
cause.name: free hair dye
